= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *BGA.FT.ACC* || Nucleus Accumbens || Nucleus || Activate motor functions under attention || ||
|| *BGA.FT.VP* || Ventral Pallidum || Nucleus || Distinguish "wanting" versus "liking" enhancements || Necessary for reward learning and performance ||
|| *BGA.FT.CN* || Caudate Nucleus || Nucleus || Excitation of correct action schemas and selection of appropriate <BR>sub-goals based on evaluation of action-outcomes || ||
|| *BGA.FT.PU* || Putamen || Nucleus || Stimulus-response, or habit, learning || Regulate movements and influence various types of learning ||
|| *BGA.FT.GPE* || Globus Pallidus External || Nucleus || Regulate and focus activity patterns in striatum, STN, GPi, and SNpr || ||
|| *BGA.FT.GPI* || Globus Pallidus Internal || Nucleus || Output nuclei of basal ganglia to neocortex || Balance of direct and indirect paths ||
|| *BGA.FT.SN.PC* || Substantia Nigra Pars Compacta || Nucleus || Fine motor control, temporal processing || supply striatum with dopamine, input to Basal Ganglia ||
|| *BGA.FT.SN.PR* || Substantia Nigra Pars Reticulata || Nucleus || Convey final processed signals of basal ganglia to thalamus and superior colliculus ||
|| *BGA.FD.STN* || Subthalamic Nucleus || Nucleus || Perform action selection || dysfunction increases impulsivity in case of two equally rewarded stimuli ||
|| *BGA.FD.TH.CM* || Centromedian Nucleus of Thalamus || Nucleus || Control of level of cortical activity || Lesions lead to persistent vegetative state ||
|| *BGA.FD.TH.PF* || Parafascicular Nucleus of Thalamus || Nucleus || Stimulation of acetylcholine release in dorsal striata || Part of ascending activating system ||
|| *BGA.FD.TH.LI* || Limitans Nucleus of Thalamus || Nucleus || Multisensory projection to striatum || from SC, trigeminal nucleus, superior and inferior colliculus ||
|| *BGA.HP.PPN* || Penduculopontine Nucleus || Nucleus || Provide sensory feedback to cerebral cortex || ||
